title: Zone A: The Deteriorating Highway
instruction: Simulate a bad road section. Walk/Scroll along Doña Aurora Street. Submit 5-8 'Pothole' reports spread out every 20-50 meters along the line.

title: Zone B: The Subdivision Water Outage
instruction: Simulate a neighborhood-wide failure. Submit 5 'No Water' reports at different houses within this block. Use different descriptions (e.g., 'Low pressure', 'No flow').

title: Zone C: Market Day Trash
instruction: Simulate a busy market area. Place 4 'Trash' or 'Illegal Dumping' reports near intersections or corners of this zone.

title: Zone D: The Flood Prone Intersection
instruction: Create a weather event. Place 3 'Flood' reports at the low point of the road, and 2 'Traffic' reports on the roads leading into it.

title: Zone E: Random Noise (The Control Group)
instruction: Simulate random, isolated incidents. Place 1 'Stray Dog', 1 'Streetlight', and 1 'Noise Complaint' very far apart from each other.

title: ⚠️ TEST: The Logic Wall (Semantic)
instruction: Force a logic conflict. Report 'Fire'. Then, at the EXACT same location, report 'Pothole'. (They must NOT merge).

title: ⚠️ TEST: The Triple Split (Spatial)
instruction: Precision Test: In Bonifacio 1st Street, Report Pothole A. Move map South ~60m -> Pothole B. Move South ~60m -> Pothole C. (Must be 3 pins).
